# Hooks Test File

This file was created to test the enhanced PostToolUse hooks.

## What Should Happen

After this file is written, you should see:
1. ✅ Ultracite formatting check
2. ✅ TypeScript type check (first 30 errors if any)
3. ✅ Biome lint check (first 40 issues if any)
4. ✅ Reminder message about checking errors
